name: Dark Matter (itch) (Sam)
description:
Dark Matter is a undertale fangame, specifically a visual novel with rpg elements and mini games.
This is a story of family, life, love and loss. Contains strong horror elements and mystery. Rated PG 13+

Music composed by https://potato-arts.tumblr.com/, opening theme mixed by Augie Bello ( @augie_bello on instagram)

What are you willing to give up for the ones you love?

Once upon a time, two siblings loved each other.
Once upon a time a sibling took life, and tainted it in red.
The drops plummet into the earth, staining it dark.
He's awaken.
He is not who you wanted him to be.
You are not who you were.
Darker yet darker.
It's growing.
It's festering.
It's crawling, reaching out.
From your chest, you hear the thumping.
Is it even your soul anymore?

The Past, the Future, everything in between-
Pick your path, and choose how this story will be told.
Play as different family members through the different time periods.

Will you control them to be good?

Will you control them to seek JUSTICE?
Will you seek out HOPE?

Only you have the power to finish this story.

the game will be rated PG13 for: body horror, violence, swearing, alcohol, and heavy themes of death and grief. Based on the Askgasterfamily askblog, though this is a more definitive version of the story and is intended to be a replacement/stand alone story.

current game progress:
day 4 out of 7 scripted (roughly 50% of the game has been written)
current art are just placeholders, needs programming

Made in Ren'py ver. 7.1.0.882, Photoshop CC 2018, Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2018, aesprite and Clip Paint Studio Pro 1.7.
